column4: can anyone help me, i dont know how to download programs without using synaptic.
well anytime i want to download something that isnt in a repository  thats in my system aready i cant.
if it isn't in a repo you can't use synaptic. However you can add a lot of repositories to synaptic. You can always look for .deb packages or for .tar.gz packages
go on the internet, search for the program. Either look for a .deb installer or the .tar.gz file
